feed.title: theausinstitute TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from theausinstitute

entry.title: "I think even people who probably don't even support the Voice agree that there has to be change. The status quo hasn't worked." "The missing ingredient is we haven't been sitting at the table with you." - Pat Anderson AO, Alyawarre woman and architect of
entry.content: "I think even people who probably don't even support the Voice agree that there has to be change. The status quo hasn't worked." "The missing ingredient is we haven't been sitting at the table with you." - Pat Anderson AO, Alyawarre woman and architect of the Uluru Statement from the Heart. Watch the full Q&A on our Youtube channel. #auspol

entry.title: It's time to face up to the reality that as one of the lowest taxed countries in the developed world, Australia lacks the solid revenue base to deliver all the programs needed for a fair society. We need a tax system that fits Australia's needs. #auspol
entry.content: It's time to face up to the reality that as one of the lowest taxed countries in the developed world, Australia lacks the solid revenue base to deliver all the programs needed for a fair society. We need a tax system that fits Australia's needs. #auspol Earlybird tickets for our Revenue Summit 2023 are on sale now! We're bringing economists and taxation experts together to discuss sensible revenue-raising options to meet Australia's spending needs. ðŸ“… Friday, 27 October, Canberra. Tickets and info via link in bo.

entry.title: "PWC misused government information to help some of its multinational corporations potentially evade taxes. "These groups have become embedded in the ordinary processes of government." - Democracy & Accountability Director Bill Browne #auspol
entry.content: "PWC misused government information to help some of its multinational corporations potentially evade taxes. "These groups have become embedded in the ordinary processes of government." - Democracy & Accountability Director Bill Browne #auspol

entry.title: When you engage the people that you're making laws and decisions about, you get better governance, you get better decision making." - Pat Anderson AO, Alyawarre woman and architect of the Uluru Statement from the Heart #auspol #voteyes23
entry.content: When you engage the people that you're making laws and decisions about, you get better governance, you get better decision making." - Pat Anderson AO, Alyawarre woman and architect of the Uluru Statement from the Heart #auspol #voteyes23

entry.title: "It was a very conscious decision to gift the Uluru Statement, a gift of hope and love, to the Australian people, asking them again to help us. "It's for you who decide what sort of a country we're going to be" - Pat Anderson AO #auspol #voteYes23
entry.content: "It was a very conscious decision to gift the Uluru Statement, a gift of hope and love, to the Australian people, asking them again to help us. "It's for you who decide what sort of a country we're going to be" - Pat Anderson AO #auspol #voteYes23
